Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பழகிய செல்வமும் பண்பும் கெடுக்கும் கழகத்துக் காலை புகின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: To waste time at the place of gambling will destroy inherited wealth and goodness of character.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown entering the dark, smoky doorway of a gambling den ('கழகத்துக் காலை புகின்') at the start of the day.
Layered_Composition.Midground: As they enter, two of their most precious possessions are shown being stripped from them. Their ancestral wealth ('பழகிய செல்வம்'), visualized as a cloak of golden coins, is torn from their shoulders and dissolves into dust. Their good character ('பண்பு'), visualized as a pure white lotus in their heart, withers and turns black.
Layered_Composition.Background: The interior of the gambling den is a place of ruin and moral decay, which is the cause of this twofold destruction.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Entering a gambling den will destroy both one's ancestral wealth and one's good character.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The golden cloak dissolving into dust is the loss of wealth. The white lotus turning black is the corruption of character. The doorway is the portal to this destruction.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Destructive, corrupting, a loss of inheritance and virtue.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The outside world is bright. The doorway to the gambling den is a portal of darkness. The symbolic cloak and lotus undergo a dramatic, tragic transformation.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot from behind the person, showing them entering the dark doorway and the immediate, destructive consequences.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with high-quality particle and transformation effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: A strong contrast between the light outside and the darkness within.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic realism, with a dark, cautionary tone.
